error_general.description: Generic error message displayed when an unspecified error occurs

error_ext_platform_undefined.description: Error message displayed when the EXT_PLATFORM variable is not defined

error_general_setting.description: Generic error message displayed when saving settings fails

error_getting_theme_value.description: Error message displayed when retrieving the theme value fails

error_getting_services_key.description: Error message displayed when retrieving the service key fails

error_auto_clear_clipboard_permission_de.message: Odmówiono dostępu do odczytu schowka. Wyłączono automatyczne czyszczenie schowka.
error_auto_clear_clipboard_permission_de.description: Error message displayed when clipboard read permission is denied

error_saving_extension_name.message: Błąd! Nie udało się zaktualizować nazwy rozszerzenia.
error_saving_extension_name.description: Error message displayed when updating the extension name fails

error_uri_copy_failed.message: Nie udało się skopiować adresu URL do schowka.
error_uri_copy_failed.description: Error message displayed when copying the URI to the clipboard fails

error_autofill_failed.description: Error message displayed when the autofill operation fails

error_no_response_from_tab.description: Error message displayed when there is no response from the browser tab

error_unknown_response_from_tab.description: Error message displayed when the browser tab returns an unknown response

error_storage_capacity_exceeded.message: Przekroczono limit danych. Użyj mniej danych lub spróbuj użyć innej przeglądarki.
error_storage_capacity_exceeded.description: Error shown when storage capacity exceeds the limit

error_scheme_mismatch.description: Error shown when there is a scheme mismatch between the extension and mobile app

error_mobile_disconnected.message: Rozłączono z urządzeniem mobilnym. Spróbuj ponownie.
error_mobile_disconnected.description: Error shown when the mobile device disconnects

error_timeout.description: Error message displayed when an operation times out due to inactivity

error_feature_wrong_data.message: Wystąpił błąd. Nasz zespół programistów już nad tym pracuje.
error_feature_wrong_data.description: Error message displayed when there is an issue with the shortcut settings

error_no_network_connection.message: Brak połączenia z internetem. Sprawdź połączenie i spróbuj ponownie.
error_no_network_connection.description: Error message displayed when there is no network connection

error_connection_error.message: Błąd połączenia. Sprawdź połączenie z internetem i spróbuj ponownie.
error_connection_error.description: Error message displayed when a connection error occurs

error_error_message_copy_failed.message: Nie udało się skopiować treści błędu do schowka.
error_error_message_copy_failed.description: Error message displayed when copying the error message to the clipboard fails

appDesc.message: 2FAS Pass to menedżer haseł nowej generacji, bez kompromisów w zakresie bezpieczeństwa i kontroli nad danymi.

this_tab_matching_logins_header.description: Header for the section displaying matching login items

this_tab_matching_logins_header_no_login.description: Message displayed when no login items match the current tab

this_tab_all_logins_header.description: Header for the section displaying all login items

this_tab_more_details.description: Button label to view more details about a login item

this_tab_more_forget_password.description: Button label to forget the saved password for a login item

this_tab_more_forget_secure_note.description: Button label to forget the saved secure note

this_tab_more_forget_payment_card.description: Button label to forget the saved payment card

this_tab_more_uris.description: Label for displaying associated website URLs of a login item

this_tab_copy_to_clipboard.description: Button label to copy data to the clipboard

this_tab_autofill_success.description: Message displayed when autofill operation is successful

this_tab_autofill_no_password.message: Wypełniono nazwę użytkownika, ale nie znaleziono hasła.
this_tab_autofill_no_password.description: Message displayed when no password is found for autofill

this_tab_autofill_fetch_password.message: Wypełniono nazwę użytkownika. Pobierz hasło z urządzenia, aby zakończyć proces.
this_tab_autofill_fetch_password.description: Message displayed when username is autofilled for a Highly Secret item that requires fetching password from device

this_tab_autofill_no_username_and_passwo.message: Nie znaleziono nazwy użytkownika i hasła.
this_tab_autofill_no_username_and_passwo.description: Message displayed when no username and password are found for autofill

this_tab_can_t_autofill.message: Rozszerzenie przeglądarki nie może autouzupełnić danych. Skopiuj dane elementu i wklej je ręcznie.
this_tab_can_t_autofill.description: Message shown when autofill isn't possible, suggesting manual copy-paste

this_tab_can_t_autofill_t2.message: Rozszerzenie przeglądarki nie może wypełnić formularza. Pobierz szczegóły elementu i wklej je ręcznie.
this_tab_can_t_autofill_t2.description: Message shown when autofill isn't possible, suggesting fetching details manually

this_tab_can_t_autofill_t2_failed.message: Rozszerzenie przeglądarki nie może wypełnić całości formularza.
this_tab_can_t_autofill_t2_failed.description: Message displayed when autofill operation fails or is incomplete

this_tab_can_t_find_inputs.message: Nie znaleziono formularza. Nie można wypełnić danych elementu.
this_tab_can_t_find_inputs.description: Message shown when input fields for autofill can't be found

this_tab_copy_password.description: Button label to copy the password to the clipboard

this_tab_fetch_password.description: Button label to fetch the password from the mobile app

this_tab_copy_username.description: Button label to copy the username to the clipboard

this_tab_copy_text.description: Button label to copy text from a secure note to the clipboard

this_tab_copy_name.description: Button label to copy the name of an item to the clipboard

this_tab_fetch_text.description: Button label to fetch the text from the mobile app

this_tab_copy_card_number.description: Button label to copy the card number to the clipboard

this_tab_fetch_card_info.description: Button label to fetch the card info from the mobile app

this_tab_copy_card_security_code.description: Button label to copy the security code to the clipboard

this_tab_fetch_card_security_code.description: Button label to fetch the security code from the mobile app

this_tab_more_actions.description: Label for a dropdown or menu containing additional actions

this_tab_autofill_fetch_card_data.message: Wypełniono właściciela karty. Pobierz hasło z urządzenia, aby zakończyć proces.
this_tab_autofill_fetch_card_data.description: Message displayed when cardholder name is autofilled for a Highly Secret item that requires fetching card data from device

this_tab_autofill_no_card_data_available.message: Tylko właściciel karty był dostępny do wypełnienia
this_tab_autofill_no_card_data_available.description: Message displayed when only cardholder name was autofilled because no encrypted card data exists

this_tab_autofill_partial.message: Niektóre pola nie mogły być wypełnione. Skopiuj brakujące dane ręcznie.
this_tab_autofill_partial.description: Message displayed when autofill partially succeeded but some fields could not be filled

all_items_list_no_search_results.description: Message displayed when no search results are found

filters_no_tags.description: Message shown in the tag filter dropdown when there are no tags created yet

filters_button_title.description: Tooltip text for the filter button that opens tag selection dropdown

filters_clear_choice.description: Option text to clear the selected tag filter

keep_item_popup_header.description: Header message in popup after fetching login data for autofill

keep_item_popup_keep.description: Button label to keep the fetched password for a limited time

keep_item_popup_dont_keep.description: Button label to not keep the fetched password for a limited time

search_placeholder.description: Placeholder text for the search input showing the number of available items

sort_az.description: Sort option for sorting items from A to Z

sort_za.description: Sort option for sorting items from Z to A

sort_newest.description: Sort option for sorting items by most recently updated first

sort_oldest.description: Sort option for sorting items by least recently updated first

tags_info_text.description: Information text displaying the number of items with a specific tag

tags_info_clear_filter.description: Button label to clear the selected tag filter

update_available.description: Notification message when a new extension update is available

update_button.description: Button label to update the extension

update_manual_required.message: Zaktualizuj rozszerzenie ręcznie w ustawieniach rozszerzeń przeglądarki.
update_manual_required.description: Error message when automatic update is not available

error_login_not_found.description: Error message displayed when the requested login item is not found

error_password_copy_failed.description: Error message displayed when copying the password to the clipboard fails

notification_card_security_code_copied.description: Notification message when the security code is successfully copied to the clipboard

notification_expiration_date_copied.description: Notification message when the expiration date is successfully copied to the clipboard

error_card_not_found.message: Wystąpił błąd. Nie znaleziono karty płatniczej.

error_expiration_date_copy_failed.message: Nie udało się skopiować daty ważności do schowka.
error_expiration_date_copy_failed.description: Error message displayed when copying the expiration date to the clipboard fails
